Issue.creator: ozheregelya
Issue.summary: Node can't write after catch up of large ledger.
Issue.description: Node25 doesn't write txns. 3. Restart the Node25. => It processed missed txns. 4. Send several NYMs. => Node25 doesn't write txns again. *Actual Results:* Node after catch up can't write txns. *Expected Results:* Node after catch up should work same as other ones. *Additional Information:* Pool restart didn't help. Logs: s3://qanodelogs/indy-1657/NodeXX/ To get logs, run following command on log processor machine: aws s3 cp --recursive s3://qanodelogs/indy-1657/ /home/ev/logs/indy-1657/ >
